options.name: Toxic Studies
options.description: Your deep study of toxins and diseases grants medical insight. Gain +1 skill with medicine. You can identify poisons and diseases with a medicine check and craft antidotes if you have identified the toxin.

options.name: Action : Plague Touch
options.description: You inflict a minor disease with your touch. Make a brawling attack that deals no damage. If it hits, the target must make a resilience check of 8 or suffer -1 die on all fitness and endurance checks for the next hour.

options.name: Reaction : Bio-Ward
options.description: When you or an adjacent ally would be poisoned or diseased, you can attempt an alchemy check against the effect's threshold to neutralize it. Additionally, gain +1 toxic mitigation permanently.

options.name: Anatomical Precision
options.description: Your medical knowledge grants insight into weak points. Gain +1 skill with logic. When you successfully hit with a weapon that deals toxic damage, you can identify the target's lowest mitigation type.

options.name: Virulent Alchemist
options.description: Your alchemical creations are exceptionally potent. Gain +1 skill with alchemy. Poisons you craft deal +1 damage and have their threshold increased by 2.

options.name: Symbiotic Organisms
options.description: You cultivate beneficial microorganisms in your body. Gain +1 skill with wildcraft and +2 toxic mitigation. You are immune to non-magical diseases.

options.name: Action : Bioshape Creature
options.description: Shape living tissue to create a small creature (minion tier) that obeys your commands for 1 hour. Requires a bioshaping check of 10. The creature has stats based on what you shape it from. Gain +1 skill with bioshaping.

options.name: Master Plague Doctor
options.description: Your diseases can spread between victims. Gain +1 skill with black magic. When a creature fails a check against your plague effects, creatures within 5 units must also check at -2 or contract a lesser version.

options.name: Master Biomancer
options.description: You can shape willing creatures temporarily. Gain +1 skill with primal magic. As an action, grant an ally one mutation for 1 hour: +1 physical mitigation, claws (d6 brawling damage), or +2 movement speed.

options.name: Genesis
options.description: Master of life and death. Gain +1 skill with alchemy and +1 skill with bioshaping. Once per day, perform a 10-minute ritual to either: cure all diseases and poisons in a 10-unit radius, or unleash a plague forcing all enemies within 10 units to make a resilience check of 12 or take 2 toxic damage per round for 5 rounds.
